text.page:
173
101-87a @#/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /tad+ya thA/ badzra ma bu/ badzra ma bu bud+d+ha dze/ badzra ma bu bud+d+ha dze/ shU n+ya tA pra be she/ bai ro tsa na gar+b+he/ pany+tsen+d+ri ya/ a ba bo d+ha ne swA hA/ cho ga ni rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /bdud thams cad dang dgra thams cad dang log 'dren thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/ /'chi ba'i tshe 'phags pa 'od dpag med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /ji ltar smon lam btab pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ro/ /rdzogs so//
